You're hired! Yay! Welcome to the Meowspace team where you'll be building what the internet has been missing most, a cat social network. Lick those paws and lets get to work building this app with using Ember and Rails!


What is Meowspace?

Who is going to be using Meowspace?

Cool, so, uh, how are we doing this?

This tutorail is going to be split into three parts:

  • Backend with Rails
  • Frontend with Ember
  • and Design

Each of those parts will be split into multiple, easy to digest tutorials.

Lez get started!

Awesome Enthusiasm! I really like it, but, uh, give me another week until I give you the rest...
